summary: Abilities from World of Warcraft for rogues
descriptionHtml:
I enjoyed playing world of warcraft as a rogue so I decided to make this modification for skyrim.
So here are descriptions of abilities that you can face.

Abitily:
1. [b]Stealth[/b]
[youtube]8lJBtXtmeVI[/youtube]

2. [b]Thief Reflexes[/b]
[youtube]fjKx9KxUi7M[/youtube]

3. [b]Dagger Mastery[/b]
Dagger deals 25% additional damage. Daggers damage now equal to sword of its category. (daedric dagger=daedric sword).

4. [b]Sprint[/b]
[youtube]jq-OEAEvYUc[/youtube]

5. [b]Cloak of Shadows[/b]
[youtube]Jc-Mic_5KjA[/youtube]

6. [b]Backstab[/b]
[youtube]qxQBep_WWVo[/youtube]

7. [b]Shadowstep[/b]
[youtube]PFALbJAhYhg[/youtube]

Here are description of abilites that you can learn from Akrios of Guild of Thieves.

Mechanics:
- Dark brotherhood gloves gives x2 damage from sneaky attacks while using a bow\crossbow.
- Sneaky attacks will hit targets that are in combat state (fix vanilla's Skyrim bug)

Original mod page:
http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/gejmplej/1/247-1-0-16396

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2141257/?]Borgut1337[/url] for "Slit Throat" Script
author: Insomniac
